verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> unto the heads הַמַּטּ֔וֹת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> concerning the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> If a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִדֹּ֨ר <S%H5087><s%> vow נֶ֜דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow לַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or הִשָּׁ֤בַע <S%H7650><s%> or swear שְׁבֻעָה֙ <S%H7621><s%> an oath לֶאְסֹ֤ר <S%H631><s%> to bind אִסָּר֙ <S%H632><s%> with a bond עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַחֵ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> he shall not break דְּבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַיֹּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> according to all that proceedeth מִפִּ֖יו <S%H6310><s%> out of his mouth יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> he shall do

וְאִשָּׁ֕ה <S%H802><s%> If a woman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if תִדֹּ֥ר <S%H5087><s%> also vow נֶ֖דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְאָסְרָ֥ה <S%H631><s%> and bind אִסָּ֛ר <S%H632><s%> herself by a bond בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> [being] in her father's בִּנְעֻרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5271><s%> in her youth

וְשָׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> hear אָבִ֜יהָ <S%H1><s%> And her father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִדְרָ֗הּ <S%H5088><s%> her vow וֶֽאֱסָרָהּ֙ <S%H632><s%> and her bond אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָֽסְרָ֣ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith she hath bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשָׁ֔הּ <S%H5315><s%> her soul וְהֶחֱרִ֥ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> shall hold his peace לָ֖הּ אָבִ֑יהָ <S%H1><s%> and her father וְקָ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> shall stand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5088><s%> at her then all her vows וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every אִסָּ֛ר <S%H632><s%> and every bond אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָסְרָ֥ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith she hath bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> her soul יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> shall stand

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הֵנִ֨יא <S%H5106><s%> disallow אָבִ֣יהָ <S%H1><s%> But if her father אֹתָהּ֮ <S%H853><s%> בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> her in the day שָׁמְעוֹ֒ <S%H8085><s%> that he heareth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner נְדָרֶ֗יהָ <S%H5088><s%> not any of her vows וֶֽאֱסָרֶ֛יהָ <S%H632><s%> or of her bonds אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָסְרָ֥ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith she hath bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> her soul לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָק֑וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall stand וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD יִֽסְלַח־ <S%H5545><s%> shall forgive לָ֔הּ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> her because הֵנִ֥יא <S%H5106><s%> disallowed אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> her because her father אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הָי֤וֹ <S%H1961><s%> become תִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if she had at all an husband וּנְדָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H5088><s%> when she vowed עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> under א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִבְטָ֣א <S%H4008><s%> or uttered שְׂפָתֶ֔יהָ <S%H8193><s%> ought out of her lips אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָסְרָ֖ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith she bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> under נַפְשָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H5315><s%> her soul

וְשָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> heard אִישָׁ֛הּ <S%H376><s%> And her husband בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> at her in the day שָׁמְע֖וֹ <S%H8085><s%> that he heard וְהֶחֱרִ֣ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> [it] and held his peace לָ֑הּ וְקָ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> shall stand נְדָרֶ֗יהָ <S%H5088><s%> [it] then her vows וֶֽאֱסָרֶ֛הָ <S%H632><s%> and her bonds אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָסְרָ֥ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith she bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> her soul יָקֻֽמוּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> shall stand

וְ֠אִם <S%H518><s%> if בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> her on the day שְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> that he heard אִישָׁהּ֮ <S%H376><s%> But if her husband יָנִ֣יא <S%H5106><s%> disallowed אוֹתָהּ֒ <S%H853><s%> וְהֵפֵ֗ר <S%H6565><s%> of none effect אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִדְרָהּ֙ <S%H5088><s%> [it] then he shall make her vow which she vowed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> is under וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> מִבְטָ֣א <S%H4008><s%> and that which she uttered שְׂפָתֶ֔יהָ <S%H8193><s%> with her lips אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָסְרָ֖ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith she bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is under נַפְשָׁ֑הּ <S%H5315><s%> her soul וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD יִֽסְלַֽח־ <S%H5545><s%> shall forgive לָֽהּ׃

וְנֵ֥דֶר <S%H5088><s%> But every vow אַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> of a widow וּגְרוּשָׁ֑ה <S%H1644><s%> and of her that is divorced כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָסְרָ֥ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith they have bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> their souls יָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall stand עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H376><s%> in her husband's נָדָ֑רָה <S%H5087><s%> And if she vowed אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אָסְרָ֥ה <S%H631><s%> or bound אִסָּ֛ר <S%H632><s%> by a bond עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> her soul בִּשְׁבֻעָֽה׃ <S%H7621><s%> with an oath

וְשָׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard אִישָׁהּ֙ <S%H376><s%> And her husband וְהֶחֱרִ֣שׁ <S%H2790><s%> [it] and held his peace לָ֔הּ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הֵנִ֖יא <S%H5106><s%> at her [and] disallowed אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> וְקָ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> shall stand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5088><s%> her not then all her vows וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every אִסָּ֛ר <S%H632><s%> and every bond אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָסְרָ֥ה <S%H631><s%> wherewith she bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> her soul יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> shall stand

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הָפֵר֩ <S%H6565><s%> hath utterly יָפֵ֨ר <S%H6565><s%> made them void אֹתָ֥ם ׀ <S%H853><s%> אִישָׁהּ֮ <S%H376><s%> But if her husband בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on the day שָׁמְעוֹ֒ <S%H8085><s%> he heard כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever מוֹצָ֨א <S%H4161><s%> [them then] whatsoever proceeded שְׂפָתֶ֧יהָ <S%H8193><s%> out of her lips לִנְדָרֶ֛יהָ <S%H5088><s%> concerning her vows וּלְאִסַּ֥ר <S%H632><s%> or concerning the bond נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> of her soul לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָק֑וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall not stand אִישָׁ֣הּ <S%H376><s%> her husband הֲפֵרָ֔ם <S%H6565><s%> hath made them void וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD יִֽסְלַֽח־ <S%H5545><s%> shall forgive לָֽהּ׃

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every נֵ֛דֶר <S%H5088><s%> Every vow וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every שְׁבֻעַ֥ת <S%H7621><s%> oath אִסָּ֖ר <S%H632><s%> and every binding לְעַנֹּ֣ת <S%H6031><s%> to afflict נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul אִישָׁ֥הּ <S%H376><s%> her husband יְקִימֶ֖נּוּ <S%H6965><s%> may establish וְאִישָׁ֥הּ <S%H376><s%> it or her husband יְפֵרֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6565><s%> may make it void

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הַחֲרֵשׁ֩ <S%H2790><s%> altogether יַחֲרִ֨ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> hold his peace לָ֥הּ אִישָׁהּ֮ <S%H376><s%> But if her husband מִיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> at her from day אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹם֒ <S%H3117><s%> to day וְהֵקִים֙ <S%H6965><s%> then he establisheth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5088><s%> all her vows א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱסָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H632><s%> or all her bonds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> her he הֵקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> which [are] upon her he confirmeth אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because הֶחֱרִ֥שׁ <S%H2790><s%> them because he held his peace לָ֖הּ בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> at her in the day שָׁמְעֽוֹ׃ <S%H8085><s%> that he heard

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הָפֵ֥ר <S%H6565><s%> But if he shall any ways יָפֵ֛ר <S%H6565><s%> make them void אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after שָׁמְע֑וֹ <S%H8085><s%> that he hath heard וְנָשָׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> [them] then he shall bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H5771><s%> her iniquity

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַֽחֻקִּ֗ים <S%H2706><s%> These [are] the statutes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> between a man לְאִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> between the father לְבִתּ֔וֹ <S%H1323><s%> and his daughter בִּנְעֻרֶ֖יהָ <S%H5271><s%> [being yet] in her youth בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽיהָ׃ <S%H1><s%> in her father's פ
